commands.setup: python3 --version python3 -m venv venv . venv/bin/activate pip install --upgrade pip pip install -r requirements.txt pip install -r dev-requirements.txt
commands.precommit: . venv/bin/activate ruff check . black --check --preview . isort --profile black --check . pyright pytest
commands.tools:
pip install $NEW_DEPENDENCY Install a new dependency. Remember to update requirements.txt or dev-requirements.txt as appropriate.
pytest $TEST_FILE Run a specific test file or test function.
pytest -k $TEST_PATTERN Run tests matching a specific pattern.
black --check --preview . Check if the code is formatted according to Black without making changes.
isort --profile black --check . Check if imports are sorted correctly without making changes.
python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel Build distribution packages.
twine upload dist/* Upload distribution packages to PyPI. Make sure you have the necessary credentials.
mentat Run the Mentat CLI to test the application.
cd testbed && mentat Run Mentat from the testbed directory to ensure it's working correctly when installed.
python tests/license_check.py Run the license checking script.
